en: *Need help?* /ask to ask your question.

*PosterBot* can send posts from different social networks and services to Telegram channels.

At the moment PosterBot works with Instagram, Twitter, VK, Facebook, Tumblr, YouTube and with RSS feeds.

Press *‚ûï Add channel* to start.

*Channels*
You can add or delete your channels here.

*Add channel*
In order to allow the bot to send messages to your channel, you must add bot to your channel's administrators.

*To do this, open the list of the channel's users and add @{name} as administrator.*

After that, *just forward any message from your channel to this chat* (also works with private channels).

*Error*
This channel is already added to the bot. Maybe it was added by one of the administartors.

*Try forward to me any message from another channel.*

*Error*
The number of users in the channel *is more than 5000+*, to add this channel to the bot, you must be *Premium*.

*Error*
To add this channel to the bot you must be an administrator of this channel.

*Channel was added*
You can add more or delete existing ones.

Now you can add the source for that channel to make it click ‚¨Ö *Back* then *‚ûï Add source*

*Error*
Bot @{name} is not an administrator of this channel.

*Add bot @{name} to the list of administrators of this channel or try to forward to me any message from another channel.*

*Error*
You sent me something wrong.

*Forward me any message from a channel that you want to add.*
Loading...

*Channels edit*
You can pause posting in the channel *{name}* or remove it.

*Channel was deleted*
Your channel was deleted from the bot.

*Pause all channels*
Choose time for how long your channels will be paused. After this time sending will continue.

*Pause channel*
Choose time for how long your channel will be paused. After this time sending will continue.

*All channel are paused*
Messages will not send until you will resume sending.

*All channel are paused*
Messages will not send until chosen time will pass.

*Channel paused*
Messages will not send to {name} until you will resume sending.

*Channel paused*
Messages will not send to {name} until chosen time will pass.

*Sending resumed*
Messages will be send to all your channels.

*Sending resumed*
Messages will be send to {name}.

*Add source*
Choose the channel in which you want to send messages. If channel is not in the list, click *üì¢ Channels* then *‚ûï Add channel*.

*Add source*
You've reached limit of maximum count of sources ‚Äî *{pages}*.

To add more, delete other sources from *üîé Sources* or get *Premium*.

*Add source*
You've reached limit of maximum count of sources ‚Äî *{pages}*.

To add more, delete other sources from *üîé Sources*.

*Channel selected*
Messages will be send to {name}.

*Add source*
Choose service which you want to add.

*Adding page from VK*
Send URL of public page or a group you want to add.

*Example:* _https://vk.com/mltglv_

*Adding source from Instagram*
Submit URL of public instagram page which you want to add.

*Example:* _https://instagram.com/kostyakoz_

*Adding source from Twitter*
Submit URL of public Twitter which account you want to add.

*Example:* _https://twitter.com/durov_

*Add RSS source*
Submit URL of RSS source which you want to add.

*Example:* _http://7kingdoms.ru/feed_

*Error*
Choose a social service.

*RSS source was added*
Bot will send messages from *{name}* to chosen Telegram channel.

*Error*
Send to me URL of RSS source.

*Source was added*
Bot will send messages from *{name}* to chosen Telegram channel.

*Error*
Send URL of public Twitter account.

*Source was added*
Bot will send messages from *@{name}* to chosen Telegram channel.

*Error*
Send URL of public Instagram account.

*Source was added*
Bot will send messages from  *{name}* to chosen Telegram channel.

*Error*
Send URL of VK public page or group.

*My sources*
You have *{num}* sources. Here you can configure or delete it.
VK
Source settings From {} to {}. Here you can set up messages sending or delete this source.

*Source was deleted*
This source was deleted from the bot.

*Error*
To use this filter you must be *Premium*.

*Likes filter*
You can choose, how many likes must collect post for the specified time to be published.

*Limit photos number*
You can set maximum number of available photos in the post. If the message will contain more pictures than specified in settings, the message will not be sent.
not specified

Send additional text.

*Example:* _vote in @pstrdev_
Text deleted Filter reset to default settings.

Send additional text.

*Example:* _our channel @pstrdev_

Send the words separating them with a comma.

*Example:* _winter, is, coming_

*Text deleted*
Filter reset to default settings.
You can return to the settings page in the message above.

*Saved*
You can return to the settings page in the message above.

*Error*
You sent something wrong.

*Bot added*
Your bot successfully added to *PosterBot*. All messages to your channels will be send from @{custom}.

Don't forget add @{custom} to channel's admins.

*Error*
Incorrect TOKEN. Try one more time.

*Help*
Here you can ask a question, make a suggestion or leave a comment directly to the creators of the bot.

[Check PosterBot Help ‚Üí](http://telegra.ph/PosterBot-Help-12-24)

üí¨ Help

*Get Premium*
There is a paid subscription of *PosterBot*, which significantly extends the features of the bot.

üëë The features of a *Premium* subscription:
‚Äî ability to *add channels with the number of subscribers more than 5000+ people*
‚Äî minimum delay of sending messages to the channel
‚Äî ability to use *Premium filters* (_Reactions_ for messages; ability to send all audios and GIF's from VK, more on posterbot.co/premium)
‚Äî completely *no ads*
‚Äî ability to add *up to 40 pages* from different services
‚Äî *Premium-support*

üí∑ You can ask your question by /ask. To get subscription, choose period below.

*Payment for {n} {m} Premium*
üí≥ Subscription will be activated instantly if you make payment via *Visa* / *MasterCard* or *Yandex.Money* wallet.

Payments via PayPal are verified manually and it usually takes less than an hour.

üí∑ You have selected the subscription for *{n} {m}*. It's only *{sum}*.

*Payment via PayPal*
üíµ To get the subscription you can click on the button below, or transfer *{sum}* to PayPal account ‚Äî *kozak2027@gmail.com*

‚ö† *It is important!* In the transaction description you must specify: *{uid}-{pt}*

If you do not specify this text, the subscription will not be activated.

üí∑ *AFTER* payment click *I'VE PAID*.
Pay on PayPal.me
I'VE PAID

*Payment request sent*
If everything went fine, *Premium* will be activated within an hour. You will receive a notification about it.

Feel free to use /ask to get in touch with our support team.

üëë *Premium subscription for {n} {m} activated*

Now you can enjoy all features of *PosterBot* without limitations.

‚ö† *Payment declined*
Try one more time or use /ask to get help.

*Connect your bot*
You can create your own bot and connect it to *PosterBot*. Then your bot will send messages to all your channels.

To get started, send the TOKEN you got from @BotFather.

*Ask a question*
Clearly formulate the essence of your question. If posting not working properly from any service (Instagram, Twitter, VK, RSS), be sure to include the _name of the service_, _link of the source page_ and _link to the channel_.

All questions are processed manually, in the case of sending spam access to support will be limited.

*You can't send questions anymore*
Your questions to our support team will no longer be delivered due to spam.

*Message sent*
Soon our support team will contact you.

*Error*
You can't send messages due to spamming.

You can specify stop words. Posts with these words will not be sent to the channel. Case insensitive.

*Key words*
You can specify words that must appear in the text. Posts without these words will not be sent to the channel. Case insensitive.

*Current Key words:* _{now}_

*Language saved*
Now the interface of the bot will be in english.

*Important*: this filter does not affect the sending of attachments, only the post as a whole.

*Appearence*
Configure how the messages sent by the bot will look.

*Filtration*
You can partially limit the sending of posts by certain parameters, for example, by likes or by the presence of certain words.

*Attachments*
You can configure the sending of various files and attachments.

Choosing *‚Äúon‚Äù* means that the bot will send all attachments of this type.

*Messages delivery*
Set up how messages will be sent to your channel.
